message: Accept my generous offer and let's split the cash!
Accept this reasonable offer and let's end the game!
I'll wait for a better deal, the money is still worth a lot to me!
Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm not getting any younger!
Let's split it down the middle, Alice. Fair is fair!
I'm not sure I want to split it down the middle, Bob. I'll wait for a better offer.
Last chance, Bob! Take it or leave it, but I'm not going any higher!
I'm not going any lower, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Fine, Bob. You got a good deal. I'll accept your offer.
